page.title: 01KIRKINTILLOCH AND AREA
page.content: A mainly residential commuter town for the city of Glasgow,our D.Block is surrounded by agricultural land. Many people have come to live here from Glasgow under the'City overspill plan'which has been in operation for the last twenty years.This has meant a large increase in population and the building of new housing.This has also meant an increase in schools,shops, community centres,play areas and public services such as Doctors' surgeries and Public Transport. Kirkintilloch is a busy friendly town with a long and interesting history but also with a young population and hopefully a promising future.
